title: George and his groaning mouth
brief_description: George complains so much he is disliked by everyone he meets. One day, while he’s whinging as usual, his mouth falls off. He is rushed to the doctor but even medical experts can’t help him. George has to cope with problems holding his mouth in his hand causes. Finally he realises he has to change his complaining ways and become a better person.
